title: Blended Learning-based Intensive Short Course for Self-Management Support (SMS) Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary health management knowledge and secondary-level science comprehension
context.additional_context: Combining real-time online classes with asynchronous activities conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three collaborative strategies for patient goal-setting.
Learners can practice core communication skills required in self-management support (SMS) education with 80% accuracy.
Learners can master SMS theoretical knowledge by over 70% through asynchronous learning modules and reflect it in pre-assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
